dfischer.utils

Class LoadtestPluginClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • dfischer.utils.LoadtestPluginClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LoadtestPluginClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    A class loader that dynamically loads "load test plug-ins" and encrypted jar and class files used to execute a load test. This class loader supports ExecAgents that run in normal mode as well as ExecAgents that run in encrypted mode.
    Since:
    V5.4-K
    See Also:
    LoadtestPluginInterface, HttpLoadTest.getSymmetricEncryptContext(), SymmetricEncryptURLStreamHandlerFactory

    • Constructor Summary

      LoadtestPluginClassLoader(SymmetricEncryptContext symmetricEncryptContext, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> encryptedClasspathList)
      Internal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadtestPluginClassLoader

        public LoadtestPluginClassLoader(SymmetricEncryptContext symmetricEncryptContext,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> encryptedClasspathList)
                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Internal. Create a new instance - this constructor is called only once by the generated load test program.
        Parameters:
        symmetricEncryptContext - the context to decrypt the plug-ins, or null if no decryption is required
        encryptedClasspathList - a list of jar files that are encrypted, or null or an empty list if no decryption is required
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

    • Method Detail

      • loadEncryptedJarFiles

        public void loadEncryptedJarFiles(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> encryptedClasspathList)
                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Load encrypted jar files. This method can be called multiple times to load at run time additional encrypted jar files.
        Parameters:
        encryptedClasspathList - a list of jar files that are encrypted (plain file names only w/o file path)
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • getPluginClass

        public java.lang.Class getPluginClass(java.lang.String className)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a plug-in class and decrypt the class data if needed.
        Parameters:
        className - the plug-in class name
        Returns:
        the plug-in class
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getEncryptedClasspathList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getEncryptedClasspathList()
        Get a list of all loaded encrypted jar files.
        Returns:
        a list of all loaded encrypted jar files, or an empty list if no encrypted jar files have been loaded (never null).
